text: Along the busy Street 61, this temple is popular in the neighbourhood. Gives a great vibe.
The people here are so helpful and friendly. This temple gives me an overwhelming feeling of peace and calmness when I come. Thank you üôè
Very good temple to praise for blessing and protection

Avery big and beautiful temple housing many different deities. Very crowded during the end and beginning of the year where people pray to Tai Sui for protection and good luck. It is certainly worth a visit.

I like the place as it is near my flat. There are a lot of people worshipping there during first and fifteen day of Chinese calendar. They offer vegetables meals on these days too. They give out red packets to seniors in this area. They give out scholarship to students in the neighborhood too. Sometimes they show Chinese wayang at special occasion like Chinese New year or mid- autumn festival. Good for residents and their families.
